Master Xonia:
You probably think that Kamaels are the best warriors in the world, right? Most of us think that way. After all, who else can teach you different fighting styles and skills? However, now that the Isle of Souls is open for everyone, we must carefully examine the differences, strengths and advantages of other races. Isn't that right? If you examine the skills and the life style of others, you might find something useful for yourself.
